name: See Waves
description:
Created by a team of 5 for Global Game Jam 2017 with the theme of "Waves", this game revolves trying to escape an underground facility filled with ravenous mutants using echolocation to see.

Credits: 

Tyler Ferlance - Team Leader/Game Artist/Programmer

Liam Bradbury - Programmer/Game Artist

Chelsea Cafolla - Art Director

Valerie Kang - Sound Designer/Engineer

Samuel Goff - Lead Programmer
